sqlMap.statement:
SELECT * FROM t07_cd_apply
create_org in ($organkeyStr$)
msg_type=#msg_type#
apply_type = #apply_type#
create_dt >= #start_dt#
create_dt <= #end_dt#
status_cd in ($status_cd1$)
apply_no= #apply_no#
order by status_cd,create_dt

SELECT count(0) FROM t07_cd_apply
create_org in ($organkeyStr$)
msg_type=#msg_type#
apply_type = #apply_type#
create_dt >= #start_dt#
create_dt <= #end_dt#
status_cd in ($status_cd1$)

select distinct A.REPORTKEY, A.FINM, A.FIRC, A.RPDT, A.TTNM from T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A, T07_REPORT_UH B,T07_MSG_UH C where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and b.reportkey=c.reportkey and B.REPORT_STATUS_CD='5'
c.senddate_dt<=#create_dt#
A.FICD in ($organkeyStr$)
A.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#
A.FICD =#ricd#
a.rpdt >= #start_dt#
a.rpdt <= #end_dt#
a.reportkey in ($reportkeyStr$)
order by a.reportkey

select count(distinct a.reportkey) from T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A, T07_REPORT_UH B,T07_MSG_UH C where a.reportkey=b.reportkey and b.reportkey=c.reportkey and B.REPORT_STATUS_CD='5'
c.senddate_dt<=#create_dt#
A.FICD in ($organkeyStr$)
A.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#
A.FICD =#ricd#
a.rpdt >= #start_dt#
a.rpdt <= #end_dt#
order by a.reportkey

insert into T07_CD_APPLY (APPLY_NO,RINM,RICD,MSG_TYPE,APPLY_TYPE,TRANS_NUM,STATUS_CD,CREATE_USER,CREATE_DT,CREATE_ORG) values (#apply_no#,#rinm#,#ricd#,#msg_type#,#apply_type#,#trans_num#,#status_cd#,#create_user#,#create_dt#,#create_org#)
insert into T07_BS_REPORT_P (APPLY_NO,REPORTKEY,MSG_KEY,APPLY_TYPE,TRANS_NUM,APPLY_REASON) values (#apply_no#,#reportkey#,#msg_key#,#apply_type#,#trans_num#,#apply_reason#)

insert into T07_BH_TSDT_P (APPLY_NO ,REPORTKEY,TSDT_SEQNO ,PARTY_ID ,TX_DT,STCRKEY,TICD ,APPLY_TYPE ,APPLY_REASON ) values (#apply_no#,#reportkey#,#tsdt_seqno#,#party_id#,#tx_dt#,#stcrkey#,#ticd#,#apply_type#,#apply_reason#)

delete from T07_CD_APPLY
apply_no=#apply_no#
apply_no in ($apply_noStr$)

delete from T07_BS_REPORT_P
apply_no=#apply_no#
apply_no in ($apply_noStr$)

delete from T07_BH_TSDT_P
apply_no=#apply_no#
apply_no in ($apply_noStr$)

update t07_cd_apply set apply_no=apply_no
apply_type =#apply_type#
trans_num =#trans_num#
status_cd =#status_cd#
check_dt =#check_dt#
check_user =#check_user#
apply_no=#apply_no#
apply_no in ($apply_noStr$)
update t07_report_uh a set report_status_cd = #status_cd# where a.reportkey in ( select b.reportkey from t07_bs_report_p b where b.apply_no in ($apply_noStr$) and b.apply_type=#apply_type# )

SELECT A.REPORTKEY, A.CRCD, A.CATI_SEQNO, A.TSDT_SEQNO, A.TICD, B.CSNM AS PARTY_ID, A.TSTM FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A, T07_NBH_CTIF_UH B, T07_REPORT_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.CATI_SEQNO = B.CATI_SEQNO AND C.REPORTKEY = A.REPORTKEY AND C.REPORT_STATUS_CD = '5' AND EXISTS(SELECT 'A' FROM T07_MSG_UH T2 WHERE T2.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY
T2.senddate_dt<=#create_dt#
)
C.CREATE_ORG in ($organkeyStr$)
C.CREATE_ORG =#ricd#
A.TSTM >= #start_dt#
A.TSTM <= #end_dt#
A.curr_cd = #curr_cd#
B.CSNM = #party_id#
A.TICD = #ticd#
order by A.TSTM desc

SELECT count(0) FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A, T07_NBH_CTIF_UH B, T07_REPORT_UH C WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND A.CATI_SEQNO = B.CATI_SEQNO AND C.REPORTKEY = A.REPORTKEY AND C.REPORT_STATUS_CD = '5' AND EXISTS(SELECT 'A' FROM T07_MSG_UH T2 WHERE T2.REPORTKEY=A.REPORTKEY
T2.senddate_dt<=#create_dt#
)
C.CREATE_ORG in ($organkeyStr$)
C.CREATE_ORG =#ricd#
A.TSTM >= #start_dt#
A.TSTM <= #end_dt#
A.curr_cd = #curr_cd#
B.CSNM = #party_id#
A.TICD = #ticd#
select A.REPORTKEY, A.FINM, A.FIRC, A.RPDT, A.TTNM, B.APPLY_REASON AS SSDS, B.APPLY_TYPE AS VALIDATE_IND from T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A,T07_BS_REPORT_P B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND B.APPLY_NO=#value#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY, A.CRCD, A.CATI_SEQNO, A.TSDT_SEQNO, A.TICD, C.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, A.TSTM, C.APPLY_REASON AS AREA, C.APPLY_TYPE AS VALIDATE_IND FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A,T07_BH_TSDT_P C WHERE A.REPORTKEY=C.REPORTKEY AND A.CRCD=C.STCRKEY AND A.TSDT_SEQNO=C.TSDT_SEQNO AND C.APPLY_NO=#value#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CATI_SEQNO,A.CRCD,A.TSDT_SEQNO,A.FINN,A.FIRC,A.RLTP,A.FICT,A.FINC,A.CATP,A.CTAC, A.TBNM,A.TBIT,A.TBID,A.TBNT,A.TSTM,A.TICD,A.TSTP,A.TSCT,A.TSDR,A.TDRC,B.PARTY_ID AS PARTY_ID, A.TRCD,A.CRPP,A.CRTP,A.CRAT,A.CFIN,A.CFCT,A.CFIC,TCNM,A.TCIT,A.TCID,A.TCAT,A.TCAC,A.VALIDATE_IND, A.ORGANKEY,A.CURR_CD,A.PARTY_CLASS_CD FROM T07_NBH_TSDT_UH A,T07_BH_TSDT_P B WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND A.CRCD=B.STCRKEY AND A.TSDT_SEQNO=B.TSDT_SEQNO
B.APPLY_NO=#apply_no#
B.APPLY_TYPE=#apply_type#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.FINM,A.FIRC,A.FICD,A.STCR,A.SSDG,A.TKMS,A.SSDS,A.CTTN,A.TTNM,A.RPNM,A.RPDT,B.VALIDATE_IND,B.INVALID_DT,B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD,B.CREATE_ORG ,B.APPLICATION_NUM FROM
T07_NBS_RBIF A, T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_RBIF_UH A, T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_RBIF A, T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY=B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CTIF_SEQNO,A.CTNM,A.CITP,A.CTID,A.CSNM,A.CTTP,A.CCTL,A.CTAR,A.CCEI,A.CTNT,A.CTVC,A.RGCP,A.CRNM,A.CRIT,A.CRID,A.ATNM,A.VALIDATE_IND,B.PBC_MSG_TYPE_CD FROM
T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_CTIF_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM
T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_CTIF_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_CTIF A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.RPDI_SEQNO,A.BKNM,A.BITP,A.BKID,A.BKNT,A.TSTM,A.TRCD,A.TICD,A.TSTP,A.TSCT,A.TSDR,A.CRSP,A.CRTP,A.CRAT,A.CFIN,A.CFCT,A.CFNC,A.CFRC,A.TCNM,A.TCIT,A.TCID,A.TCAT,A.TCAC,A.VALIDATE_IND FROM
T07_NBS_RPDI A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_RPDI_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_RPDI A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM
T07_NBS_RPDI A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_RPDI_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_RPDI A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT A.REPORTKEY,A.CTIF_SEQNO,A.ATIF_SEQNO,A.CATP,A.CTAC,A.OATM,A.CATM,A.VALIDATE_IND,A.pbc_crt_dt FROM
T07_NBS_ATIF A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_ATIF_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_ATIF A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORTKEY) FROM
T07_NBS_ATIF A , T07_REPORT B
T07_NBS_ATIF_UH A , T07_REPORT_UH B
T07_NBS_ATIF A , T07_REPORT B
WHERE A.REPORTKEY = B.REPORTKEY AND B.REPORTKEY=#reportkey#
SELECT * FROM T07_CD_APPLY WHERE APPLY_NO=#value#

SELECT * FROM T07_BS_REPORT_P
APPLY_NO=#apply_no#
APPLY_TYPE=#apply_type#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_BS_REPORT_P
APPLY_NO=#apply_no#

SELECT * FROM T07_BH_TSDT_P
APPLY_NO=#apply_no#
APPLY_TYPE=#apply_type#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_BH_TSDT_P
APPLY_NO=#apply_no#

SELECT * FROM
T07_NBH_TSDT
T07_NBH_TSDT_UH
T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
TICD = #ticd#
TSDT_SEQNO = $tsdt_seqno$

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_NBH_TSDT
REPORTKEY = #reportkey#
TICD = #ticd#
TSDT_SEQNO = $tsdt_seqno$
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T07_REPORT WHERE REPORTKEY=#value#
